title: Google apps not working on Pixel 5
content:
Updated the software, turned off and on, paused the apps, deleted cache/app data.

At the point now where I want to do a hard reset but there is no google account associated with the phone to backup to. when I go to add an account, the app keeps crashing and I am not able to. I don't want to hard reset until I have a backup. 

Problem started with gmail app crashing, now its all things google.
